user_profile.name: Emma Thompson
user_profile.description: Emma Thompson is a 22-year-old university student with advanced technical skills, spending much of her time studying and engaging with online platforms. Friendly in nature yet reserved in expressiveness, she approaches challenges with caution, preferring to thoroughly analyze details before making decisions. Currently, she seeks an accessible home due to her desire for independence, but her risk-averse attitude and limited previous experience in real estate make her approach careful and well-researched.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Hosting friends in a comfortable environment
task_specific_attributes.timeline: 3-6 months for the search and acquisition process
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local real estate agencies or online property listing platforms
additional_requirements: Nearby grocery stores and healthcare facilities

examples: I need a smartphone with a good camera and decent battery life. Something reliable for everyday use.
Looking for a gaming laptop that can handle new releases. I'd prefer something with a good display.
Can you recommend a home security system? We have a medium-sized house and would need outdoor coverage.

final_hidden_states.inner_thoughts: The assistant's consistent support is very comforting. I like that I can come back whenever I’m ready. It's nice to know that I have options and don't have to rush into anything.

satisfaction.explanation: The continuous availability and readiness to assist with either the housing search or another topic make me feel respected and understood.
